data.route_analysis: Guatemala's connectivity through major airports and local transport options such as shuttles and buses.
data.seasonal_patterns: Best months to visit Guatemala range from November to April for pleasant weather. Cooler nights and warm days make it ideal for exploration.
data.climate: Expect a tropical climate. October to March is the dry season, perfect for outdoor activities.
data.culture: Rich Mayan heritage with festivals such as the Day of the Dead, showcasing unique traditions and local cuisine.
data.attractions: Key destinations include the ancient Mayan ruins of Tikal, the colonial city of Antigua, and stunning natural landscapes like Lake Atitl√°n.
